subject: Steroids
organizations: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities investigating Roger Clemens have also convened a grand jury to determine if Astros’ shortstop Miguel Tejada made false statements about using performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Federal authorities investigating Roger Clemens have also convened a grand jury to determine if Astros’ shortstop Miguel Tejada made false statements about using performance-enhancing drugs.
